page.title: 15Chestnut Farm,Askham Bryan
page.content: Chestnut Farm is in the village of Askham Bryan. The farmer's name is Clive Walker, and he has a son who works on the farm too. He has been a farmer for 20 years.The farmer has 120 acres of farm land.The animals he has are ninety sheep, three cows and five calves.The cows are reared for beef.The farmer milks his cows twice a day and the milk goes to the calves.The crops the farmer grows at the moment are wheat, barley, sugar beet, turnips,mangolds and potatoes.The sugar beet is transported to the sugar beet factory in near by York.The farmer has three tractors, one potato-picker,a combine-harvester and two trailers. The farmer said: "I like cattle best on the farm."
